author: Not available

text.0: Ful oft þæt gegongeð,      mid godes meahtum,
text.1: þætte wer ond wif      in woruld cennað
text.11: wealic weorþeð.      Sceal hine wulf etan,
text.13: modor bimurneð.      Ne bið swylc monnes geweald!
text.14: Sumne sceal hungor ahiþan,      sumne sceal hreoh fordrifan,
text.15: sumne sceal gar agetan,      sumne guð abreotan.
text.16: Sum sceal leomena leas      lifes neotan,
text.17: folmum ætfeohtan,      sum on feðe lef,
text.2: bearn mid gebyrdum      ond mid bleom gyrwað,
text.20: Sum sceal on holte      of hean beame
text.21: fiþerleas feallan;      bið on flihte seþeah,
text.22: laceð on lyfte,      oþþæt lengre ne bið
text.23: westem wudubeames.      þonne he on wyrtruman
text.25: fealleþ on foldan,      feorð biþ on siþe.
text.26: Sum sceal on feþe      on feorwegas
text.27: nyde gongan      ond his nest beran,
text.3: tennaþ ond tætaþ,      oþþæt seo tid cymeð,
text.32: Sum sceal on geapum      galgan ridan,
text.37: noþer he þy facne mæg      folmum biwergan,
text.38: laþum lyftsceaþan,      biþ his lif scæcen,
text.4: gegæð gearrimum,      þæt þa geongan leomu,
text.41: bewegen wælmiste.      Bið him werig noma!
text.46: seo hyre bearn gesihð      brondas þeccan.
text.49: were winsadum;      bið ær his worda to hræd.
text.50: Sum sceal on beore      þurh byreles hond
text.51: meodugal mæcga;      þonne he gemet ne con
text.53: ac sceal ful earmlice      ealdre linnan,
text.55: ond hine to sylfcwale      secgas nemnað,
text.57: Sum sceal on geoguþe      mid godes meahtum
text.59: ond on yldo eft      eadig weorþan,
text.6: Fergað swa ond feþað      fæder ond modor,
text.62: þæs þe ænig fira mæge      forð gehealdan.
text.65: scyreþ ond scrifeð      ond gesceapo healdeð,
text.67: sumum geogoþe glæd,      sumum guþe blæd,
text.68: gewealdenne wigplegan,      sumum wyrp oþþe scyte,
text.7: giefað ond gierwaþ.      God ana wat
text.73: ful oft he gehyrdeð      ond gehyrsteð wel,
text.74: brytencyninges beorn,      ond he him brad syleð
text.75: lond to leane.      He hit on lust þigeð.
text.76: Sum sceal on heape      hæleþum cweman,
text.78: þær biþ drincendra      dream se micla.
text.79: Sum sceal mid hearpan      æt his hlafordes
text.84: Sum sceal wildne fugel      wloncne atemian,
text.85: heafoc on honda,      oþþæt seo heoroswealwe
text.86: wynsum weorþeð;      deþ he wyrplas on,
text.87: fedeþ swa on feterum      fiþrum dealne,
text.89: oþþæt se wælisca      wædum ond dædum
text.94: sceop ond scyrede      ond gesceapo ferede
text.96: Forþon him nu ealles þonc      æghwa secge,
text.97: þæs þe he fore his miltsum      monnum scrifeð.

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
